subject: Re: Master Lock Website Updates
preview: Hi Bonnie,  Hope you are having a wonderful Friday!  We're happy to inform you that all updates have already been implemented on the website.  👉https://masterlockconnectedproducts.com.au/  Kindly c

full_threads.body:
Hi Bonnie,

Hope you are having a wonderful Friday!

We're happy to inform you that all updates have already been implemented on the website.

👉https://masterlockconnectedproducts.com.au/

Kindly check and let us know if that's all good on your end.

Hi Bonnie,

Thank you for flagging this to us.

We have successfully fixed the size issue on our end. Kindly check if that's all good now:
👉https://masterlockconnectedproducts.com.au/

The size difference was caused by the uploaded image being larger than the others.
We've now set a fixed size for the boxes to ensure they stay consistent moving forward.

If you have any further questions, just let us know—we're happy to help!

Hi team.

For some reason, the indoor lock tile is appearing a lot larger than the others



Can you please correct this?

Thanks

Bonnie Sudirwan

Marketing Communications Manager





bsudirwan@mayohardware.com.au



http://www.mayohardware.com.au/



0408 331 966



Customer Service: 1300 360 211

@joy Done with updating the logos in the integrations page.

(5mins)

Hi Bonnie,

We appreciate your update.

We'll remove the other logos and let you know once done.

@whil Let's update the Integrations. Thank you!

👉See updated logos to keep on the page here.

Hi Joy,

There have been changes to the partners we can include on our Integrations page. Please only include the ones circled in green for now.

Thank you

Bonnie Sudirwan

Marketing Communications Manager





bsudirwan@mayohardware.com.au



http://www.mayohardware.com.au/



0408 331 966



Customer Service: 1300 360 211


CONFIDENTIALITY NOTICE: This e-mail message, including any attachments, is for the sole use of the intended recipient(s) and may contain confidential and privileged information or otherwise be protected by law. Any unauthorised review, use, disclosure or distribution is prohibited. Just wanted to share a quick update on the requests:

  • "Solutions by Industry" Page updates – Done
  • New "Integrations" page – Done and added in the top menu
  • New "Padlock - Indoor" – Done
  • Merge padlock links in the footer – Done
  • Vault Support update – Done
  • Collapsible Product detail – Done. Overview and Service & Support are currently hidden until we have content for them, but I’ll get those live as soon as the content is ready.

Please let me know if there’s anything else you’d like me to adjust.

(TIme: 260mins)

Can we check on these @whil. I have attached the files needed for the updates:

1. New page: Integrations page
2. Updates:
• New Product Category - Padlocks (Indoor)
• All Products page - new Specifications format
• Vault Support page - format update + new section
• Order confirmation changes

👉 See slides for the updates here

action.text: Joy T assigned to Joy T

full_threads.body:
Hi Bonnie,

Hope you're having a great day!

Thanks so much for sharing these updates:

1. New page: Integrations page
2. Updates:
• New Product Category - Padlocks (Indoor)
• All Products page - new Specifications format
• Vault Support page - format update + new section
• Order confirmation changes

I've looped in our Support team to help with your requests for Masterlock.

We'll keep you posted on progress this week-rest assured, it's all in motion.

Always happy to help if anything else comes up!

Thanks,
Joy

On Fri, Sep 5, 2025 at 8:20 AM Bonnie Sudirwan <bsudirwan@mayohardware.com.au> wrote:
Hi Joy,

Please find attached the order confirmation I received for an order I placed on the Master Lock website.

Can you please have this updated to reflect the below changes:
  • Include the Master Lock logo, instead of the brand name in text, as highlighted below. Master Lock is also two words, not joined into one.
  • Can the product description be updated to reflect the product name, instead of the category? i.e. 'Padlocks - Outdoor' should say 'Bluetooth Outdoor Padlock'. Can you please have
  • Move the list price to below the SKU code for all product pages



Thank you

Bonnie Sudirwan
Marketing Communications Manager


bsudirwan@mayohardware.com.au

www.mayohardware.com.au
